title: Scaramucci Lashes Out, GOP Scrambles on Health Care: A Closer Look | Andrea Mitchell
description:
Seth takes a closer look at the backlash the Trump White House continues to face over the President's cruel and sudden decision to ban transgender people from serving in the military, as well as incoming White House Communications Director Anthony Scaramucci's wild interview with The New Yorker. (0:20)
Then, NBC News foreign affairs correspondent Andrea Mitchell gives her take on Senate Republicans' health care confusion, Trump's surprise ban on transgender people in the military and the administration's aversion to free press. (13:20)
Mitchell then goes backstage to take a few more questions exclusive to this podcast from Late Night producer Henry Melcher. (20:14)
